articles.content:

articles.title: ‘Dominant’, ‘What a find’: Doncaster Rovers player ratings in Crawley Town win - Doncaster Free Press
articles.description: Doncaster Rovers recorded their biggest win of the season with a 4-1 victory over struggling Crawley Town at the Eco-Power Stadium.
articles.content:
George Millers double either side of goals from Joseph Olowu and Kyle Hurst saw off the challenge of Crawley, who had cancelled out Rovers lead through James Tilley to make it 1-1 at half time.

articles.title: Scarlets 39-55 Ulster: Welsh side fall short in 12-try thriller as star lands 30-point haul - Wales Online
articles.description: Dwayne Peel's men hosted Ulster in United Rugby Championship action at Parc y Scarlets
articles.content:
A 30-point haul from Ulster scrum-half John Cooney proved the difference as the Scarlets fell short in a 12-try thriller in Llanelli.
